verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Who is able to keep you from stumbling
And to make you stnd in the presence
Of His glory, blameless with great joy.
To the only God our Father
Through Jesus Christ our Lord
Be all glory, majesty, dominion, and power
For all time now and forever.
Amen. Amen.
Amen. Amen.
Amen. Amen.
Amen and Amen and Amen.
